author: rse
msg: Adjust the banner we print after "make install":
1. Make sure the user _first_ edits or at least reviews
the config files and _then_ tries to fire up Apache.  (This is IMHO
important because we know of problems like "Group #-1" which currently lead
to a "Haha...  immediately fire it up. Good joke" by the users)
